panels.description: Percentage of the stake that view your node as sufficiently online and correct to vote that node be awarded at the end of the staking period.
panels.title: Rewarding stake

panels.description: Stake weighted average uptime of your node, as reported by network peers. If this falls below 80% node probably won't be rewarded for the current staking period.
panels.title: Uptime average

panels.description: Number of accepted and rejected vertices on the X chain in the last minute
panels.title: X Chain Vertices

panels.description: Percentage of CPU used
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Percentage of storage filled
panels.title: Disk Space Used

panels.description: Number of currently failing internal health checks
panels.title: Failing health checks

panels.description: Average time it takes to get a response from a peer
panels.title: Network Latency

panels.description: Number of accepted and rejected blocks on the P chain in the last minute.
panels.title: P Chain Blocks

panels.description: Number of P-Chain blocks this node has proposed on the network in the last day. Since block production on P-Chain is usually below the target rate, every node proposes P blocks.
panels.title: Proposed P blocks

panels.description: Amount of AVAX currently staked
panels.title: Total staked

panels.description: Amount of network stake node is currently connected to
panels.title: Stake connected

panels.description: Number of peers node is connected to
panels.title: Peer count

panels.description: Number of accepted and rejected blocks on the C chain in the last minute.
panels.title: C Chain Blocks

panels.description: Number of blocks this node has proposed on the C-Chain in the last day. Since C-Chain blocks are produced at a fast rate, block producers are selected by stake weight.
panels.title: Proposed C blocks

panels.description: Number of blocks/vertices accepted in the last minute
panels.title: Accepted Blocks/Vertices

panels.description: Number of blocks/vrtices currently being processed by the node
panels.title: Processing

panels.description: Number of peers currently being benched (ignored) by the node
panels.title: Benched nodes

panels.description: Number of successful queries per chain in the last minute
panels.title: Queries success

panels.description: Measures how long each database operation is taking on average
panels.title: Database Operations Latency

panels.description: The average time between a block's issuance and acceptance by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Average Block Acceptance Latency(p-chain)

panels.description: The average time between a block's issuance and rejection by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Average Block Rejection Latency(p-chain)

panels.description: Percentage of queries for which we receive chits on time.
panels.title: Percentage of Successful Queries(p-chain)

panels.description:
Measures how much of each second is being spent handling different kinds of messages on the P-Chain.
The value for chits, for example, is the number of seconds spent handling chits messages per second, over the last 30 seconds.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (Total)(p-chain)

panels.description:
Measures how long each kind of request on the P-Chain takes to handle.
The value for chits, for example, is how long, in seconds, it takes to handle a chits message.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (per Message) (p-chain)

panels.description: The total stake of validators currently "benched" due to poor query responsiveness. Queries to these validators will immediately timeout until they are removed from the "bench."
panels.title: AVAX Benched(p-chain)

panels.description: Measures how many of each kind of message are received per second on the P-Chain.
panels.title: Messages Received per Second(p-chain)
Incoming Messages Expired in Last Minute(p-chain)

panels.description: The average time between a vertex's issuance and acceptance by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Vertex Acceptance Latency (X-chain)

panels.description: Percentage of queries sent that we receive a response to. (Average over the last 5 minutes.)
panels.title: Percentage of Successful Queries (X-chain)

panels.description:
Measures how much of each second is being spent handling different kinds of messages on the X-Chain.
The value for chits, for example, is the number of seconds spent handling chits messages per second.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (Total) (X-chain)

panels.description:
Measures how long each kind of request on the X-Chain takes to handle.
The value for chits, for example, is how long, in seconds, it takes to handle a chits message.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (X-chain)

panels.description: The total stake of validators currently "benched" due to poor query responsiveness. Queries to these validators will immediately timeout until they are removed from the "bench."
panels.title: AVAX Benched (X-chain)

panels.description: Measures how many of each kind of message are received per second on the X-Chain.
panels.title: Messages Received per Second (X-chain)

libraryPanel.name: Incoming Messages Expired in Last Minute (X-chain)

panels.title: Incoming Messages Expired in Last Minute (X-chain)

panels.description: The average time between a block's issuance and acceptance by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Average Block Acceptance Latency

panels.description: The average time between a block's issuance and rejection by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Average Block Rejection Latency

panels.description:
Measures how much of each second is being spent handling different kinds of messages on the C-Chain.
The value for chits, for example, is the number of seconds spent handling chits messages per second, over the last 30 seconds.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (Total)

panels.description: Percentage of queries for which we receive chits on time.
panels.title: Percentage of Successful Queries

panels.description: The total stake of validators currently "benched" due to poor query responsiveness. Queries to these validators will immediately timeout until they are removed from the "bench."
panels.title: AVAX Benched

panels.description:
Measures how long each kind of request on the C-Chain takes to handle.
The value for chits, for example, is how long, in seconds, it takes to handle a chits message.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (per Message)

panels.description: Hit rate for the cache where the key is the byte representation of the block, and the value is the block's ID
panels.title: Block ID Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Measures how many of each kind of message are received per second on the C-Chain.
panels.title: Messages Received per Second

panels.description: Hit rate for the missing block cache
panels.title: Missing Block Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Hit rate for the decided block cache
panels.title: Decided Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Hit rate for the unverified block cache
panels.title: Unverified Block Cache Hit Rate
Incoming Messages Expired in Last Minute

panels.description: Database read rate. Note that these reads may be from caches and not from disk.
panels.title: Database Read Rate

panels.description: Database write rate.
panels.title: Database Write Rate

panels.description: Measures how many of each database operation is performed each second across all chains
panels.title: Total Operations per Second

panels.description: Measures how long each database operation is taking on average
panels.title: Total Operations Latency

panels.description: Measures how many of each database operation is performed each second on X-Chain
panels.title: X-Chain Operations per Second

panels.description: Measures how long each database operation is taking on average on X-Chain
panels.title: X-Chain Operations Latency

panels.description: Measures how many of each database operation is performed each second on P-Chain
panels.title: P-Chain Operations per Second

panels.description: Measures how long each database operation is taking on average on P-Chain
panels.title: P-Chain Operations Latency

panels.description: Measures how many of each database operation is performed each second across all chains
panels.title: C-Chain Operations per Second

panels.description: Measures how long each database operation is taking on average on C-Chain
panels.title: C-Chain Operations Latency
